channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Static Page eXtended
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Static Page eXtended

item.title: CVE-2022-1763|2024-08-03T00:16:59.872Z -- unknown -- static%20page%20extended
item.description: Due to missing checks the Static Page eXtended WordPress plugin through 2.1 is vulnerable to CSRF attacks which allows changing the plugin settings, including required user levels for specific features. This could also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of escaping in some of the settings
